## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have removed any console.log statements

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for new functions
- [ ] I have updated the API documentation (if applicable)

### Security

- [ ] My changes don't introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have not committed any secrets, API keys, or credentials
- [ ] I have validated all user inputs
- [ ] I have implemented proper authentication/authorization checks
- [ ] I have followed the security guidelines in CONTRIBUTING.md

### Database

- [ ] Database migrations are included (if applicable)
- [ ] Database changes are backward compatible
- [ ] Indexes are added for new queries
- [ ] I have tested database changes with production-like data

### Performance

- [ ] My changes don't negatively impact performance
- [ ] I have optimized database queries
- [ ] I have considered caching where appropriate
- [ ] Large lists are paginated

### Accessibility

- [ ] My changes maintain/improve accessibility
- [ ] I have tested keyboard navigation
- [ ] I have added appropriate ARIA labels
- [ ] Color contrast meets WCAG standards
